title: Untitled (Gathering of Animals) [Tierversammlung], illustration to Robert Walser's "Der Handelsmann" (headpiece, folio 49) from the periodical Der Bildermann, supplement to vol. 1, no. 6 (Jun 1916)
dimensions: composition (irreg.): 4 3/16 x 8 3/4" (10.6 x 22.2 cm); page: 14 x 11" (35.5 x 28 cm)
